description._content: Description: 15. Old fired area, southern range, in chronic state of erosion which has degenerated into a sliding scree and is in course of fixation and ultimate reclamation by terracing and seeding. Location: Cyprus Date: 1920-1939 Description: 16. A fired area in southern range in process of reclamation showing gradoni cut on steep slope prior to seeding up. Location: Cyprus Date: 1920-1939 Our Catalogue Reference: Part of CO 1069/698 This image is part of the Colonial Office photographic collection held at The National Archives. Feel free to share it within the spirit of the Commons Please use the comments section below the pictures to share any information you have about the people, places or events shown. We have attempted to provide place information for the images automatically but our software may not have found the correct location. For high quality reproductions of any item from our collection please contact our image library
